This is no theme to be treated with a smile.  The heart that loves Jesus will not desire the unlawful affections of another.  Every want is supplied in Christ.  This superficial affection is of the same character as that exalted enjoyment which Satan promised Eve.  It is 
                                                                           181
coveting that which God has forbidden.  When it is too late hundreds can warn others not to venture upon the precipice.  Intellect, position, wealth can never, never take the place of moral qualities.  Clean hands, a pure heart, and noble, earnest devotion to God and the truth the Lord esteems above the golden wedge of Ophir.
